Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To promote interagency cooperation in the area of science, mathematics and technology education.

summary.text: Directs the President to establish the Interagency Council on Science, Mathematics, and Technology Education. Directs the Council to report biennially to the President, the Congress, and the head of each member Federal agency. Authorizes the Council to establish, if necessary, an advisory committee. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To promote interagency cooperation in the area of science, mathematics and technology education.
